document_data.mainbody:
oot jacks were a type of small everyday metal tool in the Realms used to aid in the removal of boots.
* In the city of Waterdeep, the Most Careful Order of Skilled Smiths & Metalforgers produced most of the citys boot jacks.
* Some inns in the Realms were known to have boot jacks on access for their patrons, such as Rumnthoryghs Welcoming House in Mosstone and the Watchful Eye in Essembra.
